comment: Manual mapping of ambiguous artist names to correct Spotify artist IDs

notes.Vril: Minimal techno producer (genres: dub techno, minimal techno, idm), NOT Vrillah (reggae)
notes.Calibre: Liquid drum & bass producer (genres: liquid funk, dnb, jungle), NOT Calibre 50 (Mexican banda)
notes.others: Already correct in Spike 3, included for completeness
